title: Tom Cruise's son Connor, 24, makes rare public appearance with his father in London
text:
He is rarely seen out in public, especially without his famous parents.

But Connor Cruise, 24, stepped out in London with father Tom Cruise, 57, on Saturday, with the pair seen checking out a helicopter.

The father and son were both ready for an afternoon of aviation wearing jeans and sweaters for the low-key outing.

Cruise — who piloted his own helicopter for Mission: Impossible stunts — was seen showing Connor the controls of a helicopter.

The star of The Mummy went casual for the day, sporting dark jeans, a hooded sweatshirt and boots.

His DJ son wore his own pair of denim slacks, paired with sneakers and a Polo brand sweatshirt.
